description: A General detection for WebDav user-agent being used to PUT files on a WebDav network share. This could be an indicator of exfiltration.
name: WebDav Put Request
query: (event.dataset:"http" AND (user_agent.original:*WebDAV* AND http.request.method.text:"PUT") AND (NOT (destination.ip:("192.168.0.0\/16" OR "172.16.0.0\/12" OR "10.0.0.0\/8"))))
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g)
OTR (Open Threat Research)
